5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:“Rain fell on the day of ‘Eid at the time of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), so he led them in prayer in the mosque

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ الْعِيدِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ إِذَا كَانَ مَطَرٌ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about the `Eid prayer being in the masjid when it is raining
